title: Bad Habits All Around
itunes:title: Bad Habits All Around
description:
Tuesday 5/2 - Today on the show after a front page report about a woman who fell in love with a ISIS member, so we asked our listeners if they have ever been with someone they knew were no good for them. Also, after Charlamagne spoke about how he recently had a guy ask him for crack in his neighborhood we opened up the phone lines to see if he should have called the cops on him or not. Moreover Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day Dahntay Jones for getting fined after a game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Tuesday 5/2 - Today on the show after a front page report about a woman who fell in love with a ISIS member, so we asked our listeners if they have ever been with someone they knew were no good for them. Also, after Charlamagne spoke about how he recently had a guy ask him for crack in his neighborhood we opened up the phone lines to see if he should have called the cops on him or not. Moreover Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day Dahntay Jones for getting fined after a game.
